segments.text: It's sad how unaware the woman is of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out, wasting away while she dries that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle at her feet, she'll be upset when she realizes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good, sneaking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool looks so precarious, heart breaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One fall and it could be really bad for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting eagerly, but this mischief might lead to trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, jar full, but the water's damaging everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside is beautiful, highlighting the sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, innocent in the midst of potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the family; this could ruin their day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed, missing the joy of watching the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish she could turn around and prevent the sorrow ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR
